org.apache.ws.jaxme.impl
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ws.jaxme.impl.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

An instance of this class represents a config file. A JAXBContext requires an associated Configuration which is located through the classpath.

Version:
$Id: Configuration.java 232067 2005-03-10 11:14:08 +0100 (Thu, 10 Mar 2005) jochen $
Author:
Jochen Wiedmann
